description:
Sairei no Hebi ("Snake of Festival") is a powerful Crimson God who leads the Crimson Denizen organization Bal Masqué. He was sealed for centuries after a great battle against Flame Haze, and later manages to influence Sakai Yuuji into joining his side. He is currently leading the forces of Bal Masqué to extinguish the remaining Flame Haze and is preparing the creation of Xanadu, a heaven for Crimson Denizens.
Source: shakugan.wikia.com
name: Sairei no Hebi
